TestCase.name: testFullJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 FULL JOIN MyTable2 ON c1 = c2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NoneEquiJoinKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a1 > a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[>($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[>($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NoNullCount
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON d1 = d2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $8)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($3, $8)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NullCountLessThanThreshold
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON e1 = e2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NullCountOnLeftJoinKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a1 = a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $5)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NullCountOnLeftRightJoinKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON c1 = c2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($2)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON c1 = c2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin_NullCountOnRightJoinKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON b1 = b2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $6)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $6)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

TestCase.name: testRightJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 RIGHT JOIN MyTable2 ON c1 = c2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], c1=[$2], d1=[$3], e1=[$4], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8], e2=[$9]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($2, $7)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a1, b1, c1, d1, e1)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2, e2)]]])
